attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I found it astonishing when i filled up a a petrol station and found to none of my knowledge that the RON 95 Petrol had gone up to 99.9 this is not on if you calculate how much a litre WITHOUT TAX its around 23.3p which i belive used to be the price of Leaded fuel if you would like the government to act upon this petetion and drop petrol tax by 40/50 % then please sign today

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
